title: Instascam: Scamming the Scammers on Instagram
description: What happens when you decide to get revenge on the scammers constantly in your Instagram inbox? Seriously funny conversations. This book shows how persistent the scammers are and how they will say anything to get you hooked. This author doesn't fall for it. Instead, she gives them outrageous answers and strings them along until they can't take it anymore.
author: Leah Maye
